subject: Attention Mr. Lewis D
body:
Attention Mr. Lewis D

How Are You Doing Today, Together With Your Family? I Hope Everything Is 
Well With You. My Prayer For You Is May The Blessing Of Our Lord The 
Savior Be With You Forever In Jesus Name.

We Thank You Very Much For Letting Us Know That You Did Not Send Mr. 
Fowler To Claim Your $40 Million And Also Be Informed That Your Fund Is 
Save And Ready To Wire In Your Account As Soon As You Reconfirm Your 
Account Details. Please Be Informed That We Are Going To Get Him 
Arrested As Soon As He Come Again

However The Fund Instruction Was Giving To Me By Top Government 
Officials Saying That Your Name Is Among The Five Beneficiary That Will 
Receive Their Contract Inheritance Fund Sum Of $40 Million And I Will 
Never Want To Spoil My Good Reputation

THE STATED BELOW INFORMATION IS REQUIRED FOR SWIFT PROCESSING OF THIS 
PAYMENT

1. YOUR NAME:...
2. YOUR FULL ADDRESS:..
3. YOUR TELEPHONE....
4. AGE........
5. SEX:....................................
6. YOUR OCCUPATION ...............
7. YOUR VALID ACCOUNT DETAILS:............
8. A COPY OF YOUR IDENTITY............

Note That You Are Required To Designate Correctly Your Banking 
Information To Enable Me Start Processing Your Fund Transfer Now

Your Banking Details Required Is Such As.

Bank Name :
Bank Address :
Bank Account No:
Bank Routing Or Swift Code No:
Bank Account Holder Name:
Bank Telephone No:

Open The Attachment And See My Id Card
Thanks
Mr.Adebayo Adelabu
Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria(CBN)

subject: Re: Attention Mr. Lewis D
body:
Dear Adelabu,

Thank you for your email. I am doing well and my family is also in good health, thank you for asking. 

I am glad to hear that the situation with Mr. Fowler has been clarified and that my funds are safe. I appreciate your efforts in this matter.

However, before I provide any personal information, could you please provide me with more details about this contract fund? How did my name come to be selected among the five recipients? What is the exact amount of the fund?

Once I have these details, I will be able to provide the necessary information for the swift processing of this payment.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Wilma

subject: Re: Attention Mr. Lewis D
body:
Dear Adelabu,

Thank you for your email. I am doing well and my family is also in good health, thank you for asking. I appreciate your prayers and blessings.

I am glad to hear that my funds are safe and ready to be wired into my account. However, I must express my concern about the person who tried to claim my funds. Please ensure that this matter is handled with utmost urgency and seriousness.

Here are the details you requested:

Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Full Address: 1234 Elm Street, Novosibirsk, Latvia
Sex: Male
Occupation: International Hotel Consultant

For security reasons, I prefer not to share my bank account details via email. Is there a secure method through which I can provide these details?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Wilma

subject: Re: Good Morning Sir
body:
Attention Mr. Lewis D

Good Morning Sir

Sir I Have Received Your Email And I Understand Everything You Said But 
Please Sir I Am Giving You 100% Assurance That Your Account Details Is 
Safe Here And I Will Advise You To Go Ahead And Forward Your Account 
Details Here Because Noting Is Going To Happen To It...Your Account 
Details Is 100% Safe Here And And As Soon As I Receive Your Account 
Details Today Then We Shall Start The Processing Of Your Fund Transfer

PLEASE IS VERY URGENT YOU FORWARD ME YOUR DIRECT PHONE NUMBER SO THAT I 
CAN CALL YOU REGARDING THIS TRANSFER..SEND ME YOUR DIRECT PHONE NUMBER 
NOW

Information To Enable Me Start Processing Your Fund Transfer Now

Mr.Adebayo Adelabu

subject: Re: Good Morning Sir
body:
Dear Adelabu,

I appreciate your assurance regarding the safety of my account details. However, I would like to understand more about the process and why you need my bank details at this stage. Could you please provide more information?

Also, I am currently traveling and do not have access to a stable phone line. Is it possible for us to continue our communication via email?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Wilma

subject: Re: Attention Mr. Lewis D
body:
Dear Adelabu,

Thank you for your email. I am doing well and my family is also in good health, thank you for asking. 

I am glad to hear that the situation with Mr. Fowler has been clarified and that my funds are safe. I appreciate your efforts in this matter.

However, before I provide any personal information, could you please provide me with more details about this contract fund? How did my name come to be selected among the five recipients? What is the exact amount of the fund?

Once I have these details, I will be able to provide the necessary information for the transfer.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Wilma
